dao.name: QRY_RESV_ROOM_TYP
dao.statement: SELECT RMINV_MN.ROOM_COD, RMINV_MN.BATCH_DAT, RMINV_MN.LEFT_QNT, RMINV_MN.ROOM_QNT, RMINV_MN.ROOM_QNT - RMINV_MN.LEFT_QNT USE_QNT, RMINV_MN.OVER_LIMIT, RMINV_MN.ROOM_QNT - RMINV_MN.ooo_qnt - RMINV_MN.show_qnt phy_qnt, pg_hfd_other2.Pf_Get_left_block_qnt(:athena_id, batch_dat, rminv_mn.room_cod, trim(:as_wrs_cod), 'WRS') wrs_block, pg_hfd_other2.Pf_Get_left_block_qnt(:athena_id, batch_dat, rminv_mn.room_cod, trim(:as_wrs_cod), 'NotWRS') notwrs_block, pg_hfd_other2.Pf_Get_holiday_color(:athena_id, rminv_mn.batch_dat, rminv_mn.hotel_cod) color, trim(pg_hfd_other2.Pf_Get_order_rate(:athena_id, rminv_mn.batch_dat, 'Y', rminv_mn.hotel_cod)) order_rat_all, trim(pg_hfd_other2.Pf_Get_order_rate(:athena_id, rminv_mn.batch_dat, 'N', rminv_mn.hotel_cod)) order_rat_phy FROM RMINV_MN, ROOM_COD_ORDER WHERE rminv_mn.athena_id = :athena_id and rminv_mn.athena_id = room_cod_order.athena_id and RMINV_MN.HOTEL_COD = ROOM_COD_ORDER.HOTEL_COD and ROOM_COD_ORDER.ROOM_COD = RMINV_MN.ROOM_COD and RMINV_MN.BATCH_DAT between :begin_dat and :end_dat and trim(RMINV_MN.HOTEL_COD)= trim(:hotel_cod) ORDER BY VIEW_SEQ, ROOM_COD, rminv_mn.room_qnt, batch_dat

dao.name: SEL_ORDERDTROOMCOD
dao.statement: select distinct room_cod value, sf_hfd_get_rvrmcod_rf2(hotel_cod, room_cod, batch_dat, 'ROOM_SNA', athena_id) display, PG_HFD_OTHER2.PF_GET_ROOM_COD_ORDER(athena_id,hotel_cod, room_cod) view_seq from rminv_mn t where batch_dat between to_date(:ci_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') and to_date(:co_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') and athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) order by PG_HFD_OTHER2.PF_GET_ROOM_COD_ORDER(athena_id,hotel_cod, room_cod)
